pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interactive Detector for Spatial Associations // Method of interactive detector for spatial associations (IDSA) as described in Yongze Song (2021) doi:10.1080/13658816.2021.1882680. IDSA is used to quantify the power of interactive determinant (PID) between a spatial response variable and explanatory variables. IDSA is developed based on methods of spatial heterogeneity.
